text: 4.15 2 Ko 5.21, Hib 2.17, 7.26, 1 Pi 2.22, 1 Jo 3.5 Ne apɨl lum awl yolɨgup ñɨn ak, tap si tap tɨmel chɨnop lɨpɨg dad amnɨmuŋ tek lup okok mɨdupsek, mɨŋel chɨnop tɨtay gup okok mɨdupsek, nop abe gak ak pen, ne tap si tap tɨmel ma gak. Anɨb ak tek chɨn kɨles ma mɨdon tɨtay chɨnop gup ak ne nɨgtep gup tek, chɨnop pel yɨmug nɨgup.
